commands.title: RAC: Refresh. Useful after updating node modules.

redux-action-finder.modules.description: Modules to search for actions. The sourceType should be 'module' if it uses export statements. It should be 'script' if it uses commonjs/require.

redux-aciton-finder.fileGlobs.description: Glob patterns to match file names that contain actions

redux-aciton-finder.nodeModulePaths.description: The paths of node module folders. Pretty much the same as the NODE_MODULES env variable.

redux-aciton-finder.localFileGlobs.description: Glob patterns to match local action files to.

redux-aciton-finder.localSourceDir.description: Directory that local source is stored in for the active project.

redux-aciton-finder.localSourceType.description: The sourceType should be 'module' if it uses export statements. It should be 'script' if it uses commonjs/require.
